sentences.sentence: A single mosquito can infect a large number of people.
sentences.translation: 一只蚊子就能传染很多人。

sentences.sentence: I threw aside my mosquito net, jumped out of bed and drew up the blind.
sentences.translation: 我撩开蚊帐，跳下床，拉开百叶窗。

sentences.sentence: In recent decades, mosquito vectors of chikungunya have spread to Europe and America.
sentences.translation: 最近几十年，基孔肯雅热的蚊子媒介已传播到欧洲和美洲。
